# Module: tf.bitwise



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/ops/bitwise_ops.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/python/ops/bitwise_ops.py).

Operations for manipulating the binary representations of integers.


## Functions

[`bitwise_and(...)`](../tf/bitwise/bitwise_and): Elementwise computes the bitwise AND of `x` and `y`.

[`bitwise_or(...)`](../tf/bitwise/bitwise_or): Elementwise computes the bitwise OR of `x` and `y`.

[`bitwise_xor(...)`](../tf/bitwise/bitwise_xor): Elementwise computes the bitwise XOR of `x` and `y`.

[`invert(...)`](../tf/bitwise/invert): Flips all bits elementwise.
